cause.description:
Ever thought about purchasing a cute puppy or piglet but knowing it will eventually grow up to be too big and ugly, well it can be the same with people.
Midgets are the way forward people.
1. Everybody loves midgets
2. They have great senses of humour
3. They can be very useful
cause.mission: Increase the population of midgets in the world
cause.name: Breed more midgets
